categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Biliril was Force-sensitive, and a Jedi. A senior Padawan in the Jedi Order, the Padawan was at the Jedi Temple on Coruscant during the Clone Wars. Following the battle of Kothlis, Biliril joined fellow Padawan, Dorf and Master Taria Damsin late one evening for a meal in one of the Temple dining halls. During the meal, Jedi Anakin Skywalker entered the abandoned room and sat alone, as he did not want to discuss the events on Kothlis.
